pkgmetadata.longdescription: Earthquake Traveltime Calculations for 1-D Earth Models // Evaluates traveltimes and ray paths using predefined Earth (or other planet) models. Includes phase plotting routines. The IASP91 (Kennett and Engdahl, 1991 doi:10.1111/j.1365-246X.1991.tb06724.x) and AK135 (Kennett et al., 1995 doi:10.1111/j.1365-246X.1995.tb03540.x) Earth models are included, and most important arrival phases can be evaluated.
